hero.title: Ergonomic Office Chairs Built for Business
hero.subtitle: Manufacturer and supplier of premium ergonomic seating for enterprises

intro.label: Our Company
intro.description: KWESK designs and manufactures chairs for intensive use in the office or at home.
intro.quote: Beyond the unanimous robustness of all KWESK products, our engineers focus their efforts on innovation, always with the aim of offering furniture that exceeds the expectations of companies. For example, we cite reinforced structures with a steel-based alloy, our anti-allergic air-mesh coating, our high-density foam and our antistatic and dust-proof plastic.

metrics.title: About KWESK
metrics.subtitle: A commitment to quality, innovation and customer satisfaction

showcase.label: Ergonomic Design
showcase.title: Engineered for Comfort
showcase.description: Our chairs are designed with precision engineering and premium materials to provide unmatched comfort during long work hours.

showcase2.label: Premium Collection
showcase2.title: Executive Seating
showcase2.description: Designed for leaders who demand excellence. Our executive chairs combine sophisticated aesthetics with superior ergonomic support.

challenger.description: The Challenger 175 remains one of the best options for companies looking for a corporate-look chair with an excellent level of comfort, optimized cost and a 5-year lifespan in intensive use like all KWESK chairs. Its wide and deep seat and its many possible adjustments offer an exceptional feeling of comfort even over long periods of use.

gamma.description: The brand new Gamma 150 is the ultimate balance between comfort, price and robustness offered by Kwesk. This chair is the perfect choice for intensive use in the office or at home.

winner.description: The WINNER 125 chair is perfectly designed for an operator's desk, a sales consultant, an agency or a point of sale... With its operator chair equipped with optimal comfort and ergonomics, you can accomplish your missions with peace of mind!

corpo.description: The CORPO 100 offers the ultimate balance between comfort and style, designed to keep you productive all day long. Its sleek design and superior ergonomics make it a must-have for any modern workspace.

meta.title: BY 100 | Large Business Office Chair - Kwesk Morocco
meta.description: The BY 100 armchair by Kwesk, office chair manufacturer in Morocco. Customized and ergonomic office chair for professional business.

by100.description: With its high asynchronous backrest and innovative design, the BY 100 will easily equip your executive or administrative offices for a reduced cost, optimized comfort and a long lifespan.

features.f4: High density injected foam seat and backrest 50 mm (Morocco)
features.f5: Seat and backrest upholstered in 3D fabric (Denmark)

options.o2: Seat and backrest upholstered in PU leather

gasLift.description: The BY 100 is equipped with a gas lift manufactured in Germany by the world leader in shock absorbers. It allows variable height adjustment and smoothly absorbs the user's weight.

doubleCylinder.description: New patented double cylinder system. Composed of a pressure tube and a guide tube. The self-supporting pressure tube is designed to allow a bending movement if the load is not centered on the seat.

fabric3d.name: 3D Fabric
fabric3d.sectionTitle: SEAT AND BACKREST UPHOLSTERED IN 3D FABRIC
fabric3d.f6: Rubbing fastness scale 1-5, max. 5 - wet/dry: 4-5/4-5 (EN ISO 105x12)
fabric3d.f7: Flammability - CA TB 117-2013 - BS EN 1021 1&2 Cigarette and Match

puLeather.name: PU Leather
puLeather.sectionTitle: SEAT AND BACKREST UPHOLSTERED IN PU LEATHER

aniline.name: Natural full grain aniline leather
aniline.sectionTitle: SEAT AND BACKREST UPHOLSTERED IN LEATHER

meta.title: BY G | Professional Ergonomic Office Chair in Morocco
meta.description: Discover the BY G, business office chair by Kwesk, office chair supplier in Morocco. Ergonomic chair manufactured for large companies.

byG.description: With its low asynchronous backrest, the BY G complements our BY 100 armchair to welcome your visitors to your office. Equipped with the same features, it can also equip your meeting rooms at a lower cost while offering appreciable comfort over a few hours of use.

meta.description: The Caddy series by Kwesk, office seating manufacturer in Morocco. Chair for training rooms and professional spaces, ergonomic and suitable for businesses.

caddy.description: CADDY chairs offer optimized ergonomics for training sessions. The adjustable tablet and storage spaces give users the mobility to modify the layout of your space according to your needs. You will train your teams with ease!

meta.title: Kwesk | Office Chair Factory in Morocco
meta.description: Kwesk, professional company that makes desks and chairs. Discover our office furniture factory in Morocco, manufacturer of ergonomic chairs for businesses.

hero.label: About Us
hero.title: We design and manufacture premium office chairs built for intensive professional use.

company.label: Our Company
company.title: KWESK is the first office furniture manufacturer to design chairs intended for intensive use in call centers and particularly in any business.
company.p1: To date, several hundred thousand companies trust the KWESK brand mainly because of the robustness and refined design of its chairs and desks.
company.p2: KWESK products are recognized today as essential furniture for companies seeking comfort, style and above all durability.

history.label: Our History
history.title: The KWESK story began in 2008 when its founder Tarik Benjelloun decided to put his call center experience to good use.
history.p1: He brought together seasoned skills in desk and chair design to develop innovative products resistant to the most intensive use.
history.p2: After a few years, the KWESK team was proud to announce that its chairs and desks equip millions of workstations around the world.

point1.title: Premium Components
point1.desc: Italian mechanisms, German gas lifts, Danish fabrics

point4.title: Local Manufacturing
point4.desc: Made in Morocco with European quality standards

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: KWESK chairs comply with BIFMA and EN1335-1-2-3.

shipping.title: Delivery
shipping.desc: Worldwide delivery via our affiliate network.

service.title: After-Sales
service.desc: Repair and maintenance via our network.

cta.title: Ready to Upgrade Your Workspace?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss your office furniture needs and get a personalized quote for your business.
